name: ChromaticCreamV1
description:
This model excels at creating beautiful watercolor, ink and marker based results.

The mergers were chosen to provide vivid colors, traditional art textures and interesting backgrounds. The whites, pale-yellows and creamy flesh tones are crisp and provide a great contrast to the heavy colors and deep blacks.

I recommend a CFG scale around 8.5 or 9 and some of my best results came from DPM Adaptive sampling method.

Try including ( ink:1.2 ) or ( bright luminous design ) in your positive prompts for similar results to the showcase here.

I'd love to see your creations, please drop them in the user showcase below!
